page.name: LINCS Scavenger Hunt
page.content:
Think of three burning questions you have about your practice. These topics will become the basis for your personalized scavenger hunt! 

Now, do a search at LINCS.ed.gov for the best special topics discussion groups, resources, and courses that would provide support and ideas for your practice. Please visit the Learner Center as well to see what LINCS has to offer for learners in your classes!

Use the Scavenger Hunt Worksheet to Complete the activity.
